argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eqeq1d.1 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 2 |  | #P_dfcleq | |- ( A = B <-> A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_19.21bi | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_bibi1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A <-> x e. C ) <-> ( x e. B <-> x e. C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_albidv | |- ( ph -> ( A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. C ) <-> A. x ( x e. B <-> x e. C ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_dfcleq | |- ( A = C <-> A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. C ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_dfcleq | |- ( B = C <-> A. x ( x e. B <-> x e. C ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( ph -> ( A = C <-> B = C ) ) |
\
 Shorter proof of ~ eqeq1d based on more axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1993.)  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 19-Nov-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
